name: March 7th
story: A girl who once slumbered in eternal ice and knows nothing about her past.To find out the truth about her origins, she decided to travel with the Astral Express.As of right now, she has prepared about 67 different versions of her life story for herself.

skills.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: The Power of Cuteness
skills.description: Applies a Shield on a single ally.

skills.name: Glacial Cascade
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to all enemies, with a chance to apply the Freeze effect

skills.name: Girl Power
skills.description: After a Shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately launches a Counter against the attacker, dealing minor Ice DMG.

skills.name: Freezing Beauty
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on a random enemy.

eidolons.name: Memory of You
eidolons.description: Every time March 7th's Ultimate Freezes a target, she regenerates 6 Energy.

eidolons.name: Memory of It
eidolons.description: Upon entering battle, grants a Shield equal to 24% of March 7th's DEF plus 320 to the ally with the lowest HP percentage, lasting for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Memory of Everything
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Never Forfeit Again
eidolons.description: The Talent's Counter effect can be triggered 1 more time in each turn. The DMG dealt by Counter increases by an amount that is equal to 30% of March 7th's DEF.

eidolons.name: Never Forget Again
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Just Like This, Always...
eidolons.description: Allies under the protection of the Shield granted by the Skill restore HP equal to 4% of their Max HP plus 106 at the beginning of each turn.
